channel.title: How tha HELL do you make Commands?
channel.description:
Title says it all.
If the answer is to download, please post link. ;) thanks.

item.title: How tha HELL do you make Commands?
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

Go to your client.java. Find things like “command.startswith”.

To add a command you put stuff like

if(command.startsWith “cookie”))
{
addItem(995, 1000000)
}

The above ^ means that if you type ::cookie you get item number 995, which is money. The 1000000 means the quantity or amount.

Read full topic
item.source: How tha HELL do you make Commands?
